page.title: 07LOCAL HISTORY/SUPERNATURAL
page.content:
The first school in Haddington for senior pupils was called the {Haddington Grammar School}founded in {1379.}This school was attended by{John {Knox,}but falling roles meant that by 1875 only two pupils attended. For the next five years Haddington was without a secondary school. However, in{1879 it was decided that there was enough demand for a secondary school and so another building was constructed. This building was named after John Knox and was called{The Knox {Institute. }But in{1947}the school was renamed{Knox Academy}and a modern extension was added.
{SUPERNATURAL }There is said to be a {White Lady}which haunts{St. Mary's {Church. Somnerfield Avenue,}where supposed{witches}were burnt, is also said to be haunted.
